testcase.name: JOIN Now into Moneygaming website
testcase.system-out: Given I navigated to moneygaming.com........................................passed When I click on JOIN NOW Link...............................................passed And I Select a title as "Mr" from the dropdown..............................passed And I Enter your first name as "John" in the form...........................passed And I Enter your sure name as "Paul" in the form...........................passed And I Check the tickbox with text I accept the Terms and Conditions and certify that I am ove the age of 18.passed And I Submit the form by clicking the JOIN NOW button.......................passed Then I Validate that a validation message with text "This field is required" appears under the date of birth box.passed
